New Records: LaMelo Ball recorded 17 points in the 4th quarter to finish with 31 points, leading the league in 4th-quarter scoring with 11.1 points per game, potentially shattering Russell Westbrook's record of 10.0 points per game set in 2016-17.
Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 17 points in the final 12 minutes to help the Hornets secure a 103-83 win over the Indiana Pacers.
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets' defense held the Pacers to just two points in the final period.
